t: PANAVISE 381 Vacuum Base PANAVISE: Bench Clamps: Amazon.com: Tools & Home Improvement
s: I have had a panavise 381 for about 15 years. My son is familar with my workbench and the tools. So when he started buying his own tools and asked for a small vise for Christmas, there was no question on what to buy. We both use these to hold our drone parts while soldering or assembly. Maybe more money than other cheap brands...

This is simply the best small craft vice I've ever used. I have some Bessy and other brands, but this is spectacular! I use it for locksport and detail work on fixing mechanical components. It's heavy, sturdy, the head and base work with a variation of combinations if you get more Panavise modules.
